password.title: Password
password.server_error: Something went wrong. Your password has not been saved.
password.password_too_weak: Your password is too weak. You should add an uppercase, a number, a special character or a longer password.

infos.server_error: Something went wrong. Your informations has not been saved.

email.title: Email
email.label: Cozy needs you email to send you notifications and allow you to recover your password
email.error: The email address does not feel right. Are you sure you wrote it correctly (e.g. john@wayne.com)?

public_name.title: Username
public_name.label: Your username will be displayed when you share files with Cozy users.

locale.title: Language
locale.label: This will be the language used in your Cozy.
locale.contrib: Interested in helping translate Cozy? [Check out how you can **give us a hand** on that](%{url}).
